article_title: Lower Township MUA hits roadblocks in quest to extend water lines in Villas
article_text: We have used your information to see if you have a subscription with us. So far we have not found one. If you feel you are currently subscribed please click on the button to attempt to find your account.

og.description: LOWER TOWNSHIP — Craig Loper is new at the job running the Lower Township Municipal Utilities Authority, but he learned quickly one of the main components is dealing with residents who want potable water.
